docs.text:
MIGX


Multi-Items-Grid for MODX-Revolution.


What it is
docs.title: Home

docs.text:
Install from MODX Extras


Search for MIGX in the Package Manager of MODX and install it.


Manual installation


If you can't access the MODX Extras Repository from your MODX installation, you can install MIGX manually.




Download the transport package from 
MODX Extras

  (or one of the pre built transport packages in 
_packages
)


Upload the zip file to your MODX installation's 
core/packages
 folder.


In the MODX Manager, navigate to the Package Manager page, and select 'Search locally for packages' from the dropdown 
  button.


MIGX should now show up in the list of available packages. Click the corresponding 'Install' button and follow 
  instructions to complete the installation.
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: Search for MIGX in the Package Manager of MODX and install it.
docs.title: Install from MODX Extras

docs.text:
If you can't access the MODX Extras Repository from your MODX installation, you can install MIGX manually.   Download the transport package from  MODX Extras 
  (or one of the pre built transport packages in  _packages )  Upload the zip file to your MODX installation's  core/packages  folder.  In the MODX Manager, navigate to the Package Manager page, and select 'Search locally for packages' from the dropdown 
  button.  MIGX should now show up in the list of available packages. Click the corresponding 'Install' button and follow 
  instructions to complete the installation.
docs.title: Manual installation

Formtabs

This is the MIGX-grid, where you create the formlayout.
You can:




Create Tabs with 'Add Formtab'


Add Fields to the Tab with 'Add Field'


Create Layout-Rows for Column-Groups with 'Add Layout'


Add Columns to Layout-Rows with 'Add Column'

docs.text:
Support MIGX


MIGX
 is and always will be free and open-source, but it still requires many man-hours of development and bug-fixing 
between the releases.


Please support the ongoing and past development of 
MIGX
 by making a donation below.

















Thanks!
docs.title: Donate

docs.text:
MIGX  is and always will be free and open-source, but it still requires many man-hours of development and bug-fixing 
between the releases.  Please support the ongoing and past development of  MIGX  by making a donation below.         
Thanks!
